channel.title: How to add new player rights
channel.description: I'm trying to add an information guide and hidden moderator on my server but Idk where to add new player rights. 317 Delta.

item.title: How to add new player rights
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

[quote=“b4k 2 lumby, post:14, topic:342630”]I think this is dumb You rlly only need 4 rights… If you want to make someone have special rights
Just state the players name and add under what u want like ::pickup or w.e

if (command.startsWith("Command you want") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Playername"))  {

Make the rest of the code ur self. Lets say you wanted ::pickup look for the pickup command in client.java and copy under the playerrights under what I just put

I spoon fed u enuff you can figure the rest[/quote]

I already knew that… I’m trying to add like Site Coder to the player rights so he can have a custom crown such. If you know how to make it so I can give only 1 player a custom crown, I will gladly take the time to go ahead and use your idea for the rest.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add new player rights

Make the rest of the code ur self. Lets say you wanted ::pickup look for the pickup command in client.java and copy under the playerrights under what I just put

I spoon fed u enuff you can figure the rest

item.title: How to add new player rights

item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

Okay when I added

else if (playerRights == 5) out.write(3);
It gave me donator status. How do I change what the out.write(X); gives you? Like how to I change the crown? o.O

item.title: How to add new player rights
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

Wow I’m sorry I don’t code. I’m just trying to make my server better… geez >.>
Thnx anyways I’ll look around for that.

This is what I found

[code]
}

			// mod/admin level crown fix -bakatool

if (playerRights == 3)
out.write(6);
else if (playerRights == 2)
out.write(2);
else if (playerRights == 1)
out.write(1);
else if(donator == 1 && playerRights == 0)
out.write(7);

			else
				out.write(playerRights);

			out.write( 0) ; // no log
			updateRequired = true;
			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		} catch (java.lang.Exception __ex) {[/code]

So do I add

else if (playerRights == 5) Or something? o.O

Read full topic
